definition: to solicit/to seek/to request (opinions, feedback etc)/to petition
to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: Well, dearie, you don't need to ask me.
sentences.chinese: 好的，宝贝，你不用再征求我的同意。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, when I have trouble, I always ask her for advice.
sentences.chinese: 跟你说老实话，每当我有麻烦时总向她征求意见。

sentences.english: Presidents, the real ones, sought their counsel.
sentences.chinese: 就连总统也向他们征求意见。

sentences.english: I always ask him for advice.
sentences.chinese: 我一直都向他征求意见。

sentences.english: Ask permission from a farmer and be prepared to pay compensation.
sentences.chinese: 征求一位农夫的允许，并准备好补偿金。

sentences.english: Hannah was asked her opinion of a popular play.
sentences.chinese: 他向汉娜征求她对一部热门戏剧的意见。

sentences.english: Sometimes we bounce ideas off others to help clarify our thinking.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我们向别人征求意见来帮助理清自己的思路。

sentences.english: Many American business firms consult graphologists for advice about which people to hire.
sentences.chinese: 美国有些公司在雇佣员工时也要征求笔体学家的意见。

sentences.english: Some days later, the king again asked Qi Huangyang for his opinions.
sentences.chinese: 过了一些日子，平公又向祁黄羊征求意见。

sentences.english: Hizbul Islam's guards had no choice but to turn to me for advice;
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰党卫兵没有选择，只好征求我的意见。

sentences.english: Their books with comments at the wife said.
sentences.chinese: 言路用征求意见的眼光看着妻子说。

sentences.english: Actively solicit good and bad feedback.
sentences.chinese: 积极的征求好的或者不好的反馈。

sentences.english: Approval by the Steering Committee under Step 2 and release for public consultation.
sentences.chinese: 第2步下，由指导委员会批准，公布征求公众意见。

sentences.english: This is a great sentence pattern for getting someone’s opinion.
sentences.chinese: 这个句型非常适合用来征求别人的意见。

sentences.english: Would like to seek any toys or Lego series area.
sentences.chinese: 想征求任何玩具或乐高系列区。

sentences.english: Aplan for reform of the pharmaceutical and health care system was devised and referred to the general public for comments.
sentences.chinese: 制定医药卫生体制改革方案并公开征求意见。

definition: to consult/to query/to solicit opinion
idea/opinion/suggestion/objection/complaint/CL:點|点[dian3],條|条[tiao2]
to hear (news)/to listen to
to agree/to consent/to approve
to propose/to raise a suggestion
to ask for instructions
to obtain (permission etc)
to consult/to talk over/to discuss
to negotiate/discussion/proposal
to accept/to adopt
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to discuss/to deliberate
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to give a nod of approval
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
